hero.title: GET INVOLVED
hero.content: See why others support CounterBalance, then write and share your own reason below.

cards.content: By making flavored tobacco products attractive to young people - they get hooked at an early age, and it is very hard to quite! Oral cancer is a very real concern
cards.name: Rhea Clark

cards.content: Flavored tobacco products provide an easy pathway to possible lifelong addiction for our kids to tobacco use
cards.name: Karen Avery

cards.content: People are unaware that the effects are the same as smoking or chewing tobacco
cards.name: Amra Jusupovic

cards.content: Tobacco can damage your lungs, and overtime make it hard to breathe
cards.name: Madison Ashford

cards.content: People should never consider vapors as a healthy alternative to smoking. 20 yrs from now we may find them more harmful than actual cigarettes
cards.name: Zachary Nazman

cards.content: It is very bad for you, highly addictive and may lead to smoking
cards.name: Rachel Kiddy
